Article text: At the Altar   is a 1909 American  silent   drama film  directed by  D  W  Griffith   The film was shot in  Fort Lee  New Jersey  where early  film studios  in  America s first motion picture industry  were based at the beginning of the 20th century    1      2      3      4    A print of this film is in the film archive of the  Library of Congress     5       A rejected admirer sets up a trap to kill his sweetheart and her fiance before they married and then commit suicide  but before he passes away  he leaves a confession  The confession is found on time and a police man runs to the church to save the couple
